analyzed: gzhan yang mchog tu gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / chags pa la sogs pas dbul te rgyas par ma phye'o zhes bstan to //

original: de nas 'dud nyi shus bstod de /
analyzed: de nas 'dud nyi shus bstod de /

analyzed: byams pa dang snying rje ni shin tu gsal bar ston par tshad med pa bzhi bsgom zhes so // rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad //

original: chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes //
analyzed: chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes //

original: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //

analyzed: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med //

analyzed: phyi dang nang gi dngos po stong par bsgom zhes bstan to //

original: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //

original: srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste //

translated: adorned with the thirty-two major marks and the eighty minor marks.üîΩHe is the complete buddha,üîΩthe glorious one with intelligence and charm,

original: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan //üîΩzur phud lnga ba me tog thod //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan // zur phud lnga ba me tog thod //
translated: endowed with the thirty-two major marks,üîΩthe hero in the battle against the afflictions,

original: sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
analyzed: sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
translated: the one who is handsome and charming in the three worlds,

original: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
analyzed: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
translated: holding a sword of wisdom and a bow and arrow,

original: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: the perfect buddha in vajra posture,

original: dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan //
analyzed: dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan //
translated: the glorious one with intelligence and charm,

original: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba //
translated: endowed with the thirty-two major marks,

original: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba //
analyzed: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba //
translated: the hero in the battle against the afflictions,üîΩthe one who is handsome and charming in the three worlds,üîΩholding a sword of wisdom and a bow and arrow,üîΩthe perfect buddha in vajra posture,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis rje btsun gyi sku sprul pa'i cha lugs su bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis rje btsun gyi sku sprul pa'i cha lugs su bstan pa yin no //
translated: and so forth, the body of the master is shown to be the aspect of an emanation.

original: phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa //
translated: The meaning of the four seals is shown.

original: zhes pas yum bzhi'i phyag rgya 'phro 'du dang bcas pa'i byin brlabs bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes pas yum bzhi'i phyag rgya 'phro 'du dang bcas pa'i byin brlabs bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows the blessing of the four mothers with the emanation and reabsorption of the seals.

original: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
analyzed: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
translated: Emanations are sent out in the ten directions.

original: ces pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang kho bo dang khro mo dang lha mo rnams thugs ka nas spro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ces pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang kho bo dang khro mo dang lha mo rnams thugs ka nas spro zhes pa'o //
translated: This means that the buddhas, bodhisattvas, myself, the wrathful ones, and the goddesses emanate from the heart.

original: de nas mdun du padma dang zla ba la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
analyzed: de nas mdun du padma dang zla ba la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
translated: Then, the gnosis being is invited to the front, upon a lotus and moon.

original: dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang / bstod pa gong bzhin byas te ye shes sems dpa' de la bltas la /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang / bstod pa gong bzhin byas te ye shes sems dpa' de la bltas la /
translated: The empowerment conferral, offerings, and praises are done as above.

original: dgug cing rang lus la gnyis su med par bsgom zhes pas gnyis su med par byas te /
analyzed: dgug cing rang lus la gnyis su med par bsgom zhes pas gnyis su med par byas te /
translated: Having looked at that gnosis being, one should meditate on the summoning and nonduality with one‚Äôs body.

original: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
translated: The glorious empowerment of the vajra jewel

original: sangs rgyas mnga' bdag cod pan can //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mnga' bdag cod pan can //
translated: is the crown of the lord of buddhas.

original: zhes pas snying ga'i 'od kyis bskul te /
analyzed: zhes pas snying ga'i 'od kyis bskul te /
translated: This shows that the light from the heart stimulates the deities.

original: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bas rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa zhes bstan to //üîΩsprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //
analyzed: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bas rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa zhes bstan to // sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //
translated: The with the crown of the heads of the five families shows that the empowerment is conferred by the water in the vase.

original: zhes pas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la sngags dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du sangs rgyas thams cad sprul lo zhes bstan to //
analyzed: zhes pas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la sngags dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du sangs rgyas thams cad sprul lo zhes bstan to //
translated: The holder of the various emanated wheels shows that one emanates all the buddhas in the form of a mandala by means of the mantra and the mudra of the vajra wheel.

original: de'i don ni 'og nas 'chad do //üîΩbdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
analyzed: de'i don ni 'og nas 'chad do // bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
translated: The meaning of this will be explained below.

original: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces pas thams cad sems kyi sprul par shes par bya'o //üîΩde ltar rdzogs pa dang mtshan sngags bzlas shing mtshan bklag par bya'o //
analyzed: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces pas thams cad sems kyi sprul par shes par bya'o // de ltar rdzogs pa dang mtshan sngags bzlas shing mtshan bklag par bya'o //
translated: The knower of self, knower of other, knower of all shows that one should know that everything is an emanation of the mind.

original: de lta bu yon tan las kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa gang la la //
analyzed: de lta bu yon tan las kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa gang la la //
translated: Having thus completed the recitation of the mantra and the reading of the name, one should say, In this way, son of good family or daughter of good family who practices the conduct of the mantra,

original: bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs @34a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs @34a * //
translated: BhagavƒÅn, J√±ƒÅnasattva, TathƒÅgata,üîΩthis crown jewel of the ultimate name that is non-dual with the body of all tathƒÅgatas,

original: pa thams cad kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa'i don dam pa'i ming gi gtsug gi nor bu 'di thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang mnyams shing lhag chad med par tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig dang / yi ge 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du 'chang ba dang /
analyzed: pa thams cad kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa'i don dam pa'i ming gi gtsug gi nor bu 'di thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang mnyams shing lhag chad med par tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig dang / yi ge 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du 'chang ba dang /
translated: if one upholds all of this completely, without deficiency or excess, with these very verses and syllables, three times each day,

original: kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang ming gi don gang yang rung ba re re nas kyang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku la dmigs te zhes bya ba dang / rtse gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
analyzed: kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang ming gi don gang yang rung ba re re nas kyang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku la dmigs te zhes bya ba dang / rtse gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
translated: and if one also teaches it to others according to the samaya, and if one focuses on the body of Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ J√±ƒÅnasattva from each of the names, and if one meditates one-pointedly, and so forth,

original: gzhan yang yon tan las /
analyzed: gzhan yang yon tan las /
translated: and if one also has the qualities,

original: nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du mnyam par yi dam du lan gsum du 'don tam /
analyzed: nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du mnyam par yi dam du lan gsum du 'don tam /
translated: and if one recites it three times each day, three times each night,

original: glegs bam du byas pa la kha ton du klog cing brjod pas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs la dmigs te /
analyzed: glegs bam du byas pa la kha ton du klog cing brjod pas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs la dmigs te /
translated: The meaning is that by reading aloud and reciting the book, one focuses on the form of the transcendent conqueror, the wisdom being,

original: gzugs dang gnyis su mthun par bsam gtan du byed pa ni 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir ring por mi thogs pas de nyid du sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin te /
analyzed: gzugs dang gnyis su mthun par bsam gtan du byed pa ni 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir ring por mi thogs pas de nyid du sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin te /
translated: and by meditating in accordance with the nonduality of the form and oneself, one will see the emanated form body of the transcendent conqueror in that very place, since it is not delayed due to the power of training.

original: mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rdzogs shing dmigs pa la yun ring du gnas pa des rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rdzogs shing dmigs pa la yun ring du gnas pa des rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la /
translated: The one who has completed the characteristics and ritual and who has long remained in the visualization should form the mudra of the vajra wheel and recite:üîΩo·πÉ vajra-ma·πá·∏çala-ja·∏•üîΩo·πÉ vajra-dhƒÅtu-ma·πá·∏çala-su·πÉ

original: mtshan gyi don re re nas bstod la yon tan rnam pa 'di ltar smos pas bdag dang gzhan la dpag tu med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan gyi don re re nas bstod la yon tan rnam pa 'di ltar smos pas bdag dang gzhan la dpag tu med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By praising each of the names, and by mentioning the qualities in this way, immeasurable [qualities] will arise in oneself and others.

original: mdor na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ring po mi thogs par dam pas bsngags pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mdor na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ring po mi thogs par dam pas bsngags pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: In short, one will attain the praise of the holy, and will not be delayed in attaining omniscience.

original: yang na gsang sngags kyi rim pha thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na gsang sngags kyi rim pha thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Or else, one will attain the stage of the secret mantra.

original: dam pa brgyud pa'i bla ma'i bdud rtsi 'thungs //
analyzed: dam pa brgyud pa'i bla ma'i bdud rtsi 'thungs //
translated: Having drunk the nectar of the holy lineage gurus,

original: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir gyur la //üîΩdus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstod tshig 'di //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir gyur la // dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstod tshig 'di //
translated: For beings afflicted by the sickness of suffering,üîΩI, like the king of physicians,

original: sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du bdag gis bshad //
analyzed: sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du bdag gis bshad //
translated: Will explain these words of praise to the buddhas of the three times.

original: 'phrod pa'i sman bzhin kun la phan gyur nas //
analyzed: 'phrod pa'i sman bzhin kun la phan gyur nas //
translated: Like medicine that is suitable for all,

original: mi rtog ye shes 'chi med thob par shog //
analyzed: mi rtog ye shes 'chi med thob par shog //
translated: May they attain the immortality of non-conceptual wisdom.

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo don mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i @34b rgyud le 'u khri drug stong pa las rdo rje glur blangs pa'i le'u'i sgrub thabs mdo dang bsres pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo don mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i @34b rgyud le 'u khri drug stong pa las rdo rje glur blangs pa'i le'u'i sgrub thabs mdo dang bsres pa /
translated: The ritual of the concise meaning of the sutra of the true recitation of the name of noble Manjushri, the method of practice from the chapter of vajra songs from the Tantra of the Net of Illusion with 16,000 chapters, mixed with the sutras.

original: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The composition of Master Manjushrimitra is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Translated by the Indian abbot Subhadra and the Tibetan translator-editor Dharma-shrimitra.
